titles.title: A bill to amend section 9311 of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to delay for 1 year implementation of the restrictions on use of the periodic interim payment system under medicare.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1986 to delay for one year implementation of the periodic interim payment system for inpatient services provided by hospitals under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.
